## AsyncFragment type

Node with async metadata

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type AsyncFragment<TElement = unknown, T = unknown> = NodeRef<TElement> & {
    [ASYNC_FRAGMENT]: AsyncMeta<T>;
};
```
**References:** [NodeRef](../noderef/)<!-- -->, [ASYNC\_FRAGMENT](../async_fragment/)<!-- -->, [AsyncMeta](../asyncmeta/)
